title: Jaipur-Mumbai Train Killing: RPF constable sacked, faced probe in another ‘hate case’ 6 years ago
selftext: ....has a past service record of involvement in at least three incidents, including a “hate case” involving the alleged harassment of a Muslim man at a RPF post.
comments: Seems like he's well-prepared for a second career in the BJP!
Time to garland him and throw a gala in his honour!
